Plot: A young student (Keisuke) is hired as an asisstant film projector in an old and small movie theatre (Ginei Kan). His supervisor (a young girl Luka) misteriously locks herself in her room every Monday.
Title: Signal: Luca on Mondays
Writer: Hisashi Sekiguchi (based on the novel by), Hirotoshi Kobayashi (screenplay), Yoshinobu Kamo (screenplay)
Actors: Azusa Mine, Jun Inoue, Kengo Kôra, Yurie Midori
